findings.title: State variable visibility is not set (SWC-108)
Use of “tx.origin” as part of authorization control (SWC-115)
findings.description: Use of tx.origin should not be used for authorization. Use msg.sender instead.

findings.title: Potential use of "block.number" as source of randomness (SWC-120)
findings.description: Using block.number as a source of randomness is weak and can be exploited.
